text: Hello together, i'm started with HubSpot and i'm new :wink: We want to update our HubSpot Contacts with some from Yawave ("<https://yawave.com/de/>"). Yawave offers an API, now my question is if there is an way to integrate an API like the Yawave in HubSpot. And if there is this way, how i can do it. Thanks for your help guys. Best Regards Michi from beautiful Switzerland
<@U01EF64LFLH> You will have to develop custom script and use the HubSpot api and the yawave api to transfert contact

We just went live with a bunch of pages that were on content staging and most were published fine but a handful of them say Error: *There was a problem publishing your staged proofs to your live domain.* Please check each proof for errors. However, I see no place in each proof to see any errors. There is no indication what the errors are or what would not allow them to publish.
